gw.api.system.server

Class ServerModeUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.system.server.ServerModeUtil

  • public class ServerModeUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to the current server mode. The mode is used to control the availability of various services in the server. There are three server modes:
    1. dev - Services that are useful for development, but which would not be appropriate in production.
    2. test - Services that are necessary for testing.
    3. prod - No services that would not be appropriate in a production environment.

    • Field Summary
